## Discussion

A constraint’s identifier is available in its description. Identifiers that start with `NS` are reserved by the system.

# identifier

**Instance Property**

The name that identifies the constraint.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var identifier: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

A constraint’s identifier is available in its description. Identifiers that start with `NS` are reserved by the system.
title: identifier
